impact-statement: fMRI data from macaques suggest that sounds with similar temporal characteristics activate neighbouring regions of auditory cortex, giving rise to a topographic map broadly analogous to that for sound frequencies.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
